website_summaries.verdict: A high-sensory experience that's built with STEM-inspired tactics that encourages focus and coordination.
pros: Keeps those 3 months and up entertained and engaged
Small and easy to transport and made of a variety of materials
Attracts your baby's attention with bright colors, soft textures, and reflective ability
We love this toy can be clipped to car seats
cons: We would love it even more it were washing machine safe

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: A little expensive but the second my baby saw this he fell in love he’s obsessed w the teething ears he loves to suck on them

customer_reviews.title: Great child development toy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy for infants. It help with various fine and large motor skills and it is very colorful. My grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.author: JL Crisman

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for infants
customer_reviews.text: As soon as my son could hold something he was all about this toy. He would just hold onto the wars and feel the tough parts at the end and eventually it went right into his mouth as a tether.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Y. Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I am trying not to purchase anything too cutesy for my baby to be at the sacrifice of his or her stimulation. It seems that many of the baby toys made are designed to appeal to the parents instead of what a baby would be interested in. This does both. It is cute to look at, but has all the features that attract a newborns curiosity.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Different pattern
customer_reviews.text: What I received was a toy dog with different pattern. I would prefer to get the one that on the picture not a similar one. Dont like the black and white circles instead checked. Now have to give it away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute! Durable.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this toy! She plays with it all the time. It’s one of our go to toys.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha & Antonio Barilla

customer_reviews.title: Gave this to our 4 month old great granddaughter & it's her favorite toy that she got ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to our 4 month old great granddaughter & it's her favorite toy that she got for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: MaggieS

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Baby has loved this toy since he turned two months, and it's still his favorite at almost 7 months!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this you for my son
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this! Keeps him occupied for much longer than his other toys:)
customer_reviews.author: lllcp0129

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves it. He always bites the ears and likes the squeaky hand the most!
customer_reviews.author: R. Bayron

customer_reviews.title: Best all around toy out there!
customer_reviews.text: My son received this as a gift from his grandma when he was two months old. It’s been the best toy with every sensory activity including crinkle noises, teething ring, little mirror, textured fabric, bright colors. He’s six months old and has played with this every day, and it still looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Design

customer_reviews.title: Engaging toy!
customer_reviews.text: My son received this toy as a gift and loves it. He’s been playing with it since he was 3 months old and continues to enjoy it now that he’s 10 months old. It’s a perfect toy for the car, grocery store, or a stroller ride. It keeps him engaged and entertained. He had lots of “busy” toys but this one is truly his favorite.
customer_reviews.author: CBuelow

customer_reviews.title: Cute as can be
customer_reviews.text: I Love it! My son loves it! It's well made. Great! I would order it again for sure!!! The ears are totally my favorite part!
customer_reviews.author: GlendaSue

product_meta.title: Playgro Activity Doofy Dog for baby infant toddler children 0101300, Playgro is Encouraging Imagination with STEM/STEM for a bright future - Great start for a world of learning
product_meta.description: The adorable Activity Friend Doofy Dog is a wonderful way of keeping your baby entertained while developing learning skills! The soft dog teaches your baby about hand-eye co-ordination while encouraging tactile and sensory development using sounds, shapes and textures. Simply attach to your stroller to keep your young one happy on the go. Activity Friend Doofy Dog features teethers, a mirror, rattle, crinkle fabric, and squeaker. Adorable and practical, the Activity Friend Doofy Dog is a great buddy for any young one!
feature_bullets: Easily attaches to most prams and strollers
Squeaker, rattle and crinkle sounds for baby’s auditory stimulation
Great for developing motor skills and hand eye co-ordination

"STEM toys for toddlers - STEM / STEAM educational principles Playgro Age for Stage incorporates STEM to help your baby develop a prosperous future.  The Top four(4) development features for each product are clearly seen on Playgro packaging to assist parents make the correct choice for your baby!
